Dialog Icons

These are the current DialogBox, InputBox and MessageBox Icons that are available.

To define the windows style vs motif/java style you can do that in your window options:
  * Motif
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/metal-error.png] -- Error Icon (Motif)
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/metal-info.png] -- Info Icon (Motif)
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/metal-question.png] -- Question Icon (Motif)
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/metal-warning.png] -- Warning Icon (Motif)
  * Windows
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/windows-error.png] -- Error Icon (Windows)
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/windows-info.png] -- Info Icon (Windows)
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/windows-question.png] -- Question Icon (Windows)
    * [http://gerbildrop.com/downloads/windows-warning.png] -- Warning Icon (Windows)
